name: The Adventures of Rorie & Ben
description:
Help Rorie and Ben save Giant Bomb after all the video games go missing! Collect all the games to fight the evil WaDan!

Controls:
(Controls can be viewed in-game at any time by pressing the Escape key)
W A S D: Move your character.
E: Switch characters
SPACEBAR: Jump
MOVE MOUSE: Move camera
(As Rorie) LEFT CLICK: Shoot lasers
ESCAPE: Pause and view controls.
